Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Positive Bacterial Infections/Actinomycetales Infections/Mycobacterium Infections/Mycobacterium Infections, Atypical/Buruli Ulcer
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Ulcer/Buruli Ulcer
Record.Description: A lesion in the skin and subcutaneous tissues due to infections by MYCOBACTERIUM ULCERANS. It was first reported in Uganda, Africa.
